topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55552d2963687277c9c00d00#post_55552d2963687277c9c00d00

You fell on your trap (It's action mangas)

And really, it's like anything. There's Seinen and Shojo works that have artwork the likes of One Piece could only dream.

Reason why Action mangas get more recognition is because unlike the former, and until a couple years, the latter, is the one that gets more exposure since it's easier to monetize.
